events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like to request a refund. This has been quite disappointing as I needed the correct product urgently.
Classified case under Refund after detecting keywords relating to money back and product return in the customer's complaint message.
Support agent Sofia has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order containing the incorrect item.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll do my best to get this resolved quickly for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund more efficiently.
Here is my order number 987654321, and I have attached a photo of the product I received, which is not what I ordered. Please advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for this order and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect item at no cost.
I appreciate your prompt response and the refund offer. I will send the item back using the shipping label once I receive it.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the shipping label and if everything is going smoothly with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the item back. Thank you for the excellent support throughout this matter.
We are happy to hear that your issue has been resolved. Closing this case now, and feel free to contact us again if needed.
